alert.note: Alert for Bracken; Pendleton; Robertson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 22 at 5:52PM EDT until June 22 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM EDT FOR ROBERTSON...SOUTHWESTERN BRACKEN AND SOUTHEASTERN PENDLETON COUNTIES... At 552 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located from near Brooksville to 11 miles southeast of Falmouth to 8 miles northwest of Cynthiana, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Brooksville, Santa Fe, Browning Corner, Milford, Stonewall, Petra, Parina, Mckinneysburg, Hittville and Powersville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
